name: Life As A Dung Beetle
description:
This is a game made for #WizardJam2016 and is based on the Idle Thumbs episode title "Life As A Dung Beetle." Click here to see the other entrants to the game jam.

Made using Blender in two afternoons. Random project. I hadn't made a game in a year or so and decided this would be a fun little exercise. Everything went pretty smoothly.

Enjoy!
